name: DIGITAL SOVEREIGNTY ALLIANCE
description: Nonprofit organization promoting Web3 and artificial intelligence technology
sampleDescriptions: Advocacy for responsible, ethical policies in the rapidly evolving world of emerging technologies and web 3, including but not limited to blockchain, cryptocurrency, decentralized finance, and AI.
